ARABIC: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَفَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَٱسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But as for those who were kafir: 'Were My Signs not recited to you and yet you proved arrogant; you were a people of evildoers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As for the infidels, (it will be said): "Were not My messages read out to you? But you behaved with self-conceit, and became a sinful people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But those who denied the Truth, they shall be told: “Were My Signs not rehearsed to you? But you waxed proud and became a guilty people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: To the unbelievers the Lord will say, "Were not Our revelations recited to you and did not you arrogantly reject them? You were a sinful people".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And to those who disbelieved, it will be said “Was it not that Our verses were recited to you? In response you were haughty and were a guilty people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But as for those who disbelieved (it will be said to them): "Were not Our Ayat recited to you But you were proud, and you were a people who were criminals."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: As to those who disbelieved: What! were not My communications recited to you? But you were proud and you were a guilty people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But as for those who have disbelieved: 'Were not My signs recited to you, and you waxed proud, and were a sinful people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And as for those who disbelieved (it will be said unto them): Were not Our revelations recited unto you? But ye were scornful and became a guilty folk.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But those who rejected the truth [will be asked], "When My revelations were recited to you, were you not arrogant and did you not persist in wicked deeds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And as for those who disbelieved: Were not My revelations rehearsed Unto you? but ye were stiff necked, and ye were a people guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But as for the faithless, [they will be asked,] ‘Were not My signs recited to you? But you were disdainful, and you were a guilty lot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But as to those who rejected Allah, (to them will be said): "Were not Our Signs rehearsed to you? But ye were arrogant, and were a people given to sin!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But as for those who disbelieved (it will be said to them): "Were not Our Verses recited to you? But you were proud, and you were a people who were Mujrimun (polytheists, disbelievers, sinners, criminals)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But, to the unbelievers (it will be said): 'Were My verses not recited to you, but you were proud and were you not a sinful nation'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But as for those who disbelieved: “Were My revelations not recited to you? But you turned arrogant, and were guilty people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [45:31]   But as for those who disbelieved, it will be said to them: ‘Were not My signs, [was not] the Qur’ān, recited to you, but you were disdainful, you were arrogant, and were a guilty, a disbelieving, lot?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And as for those who disbelieved (it will be said unto them): Were not Our revelations recited unto you) in the life of the world? (But ye were scornful) but you were too proud to believe in them (and became a guilty folk) and became idolatrous folk.
